Articles.Content: Has anyone made a mod for this yet?I don't want the product of SJWs and butthurt feminists in my game.

As there is already [a thread asking for a mod like this](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118199) in the correct subforum, and as posts about "SJWs and butthurt feminists" really aren't welcome here, I'm locking this thread before it starts.
